questions.question:
The new software promised to increase efficiency by automating routine tasks. _______, many employees found that they spent more time troubleshooting errors than they had saved.

Which choice completes the text with the most logical transition?
questions.explanation: The second sentence presents a contrasting outcome to the promise in the first sentence. 'However' signals contrast. 'Therefore' implies causation, 'Similarly' implies comparison of like things, and 'Furthermore' implies addition of supporting informationâ€”none fit the contrasting relationship.
